functions.name: initInjections
functions.description: injects the javascript that adds buttons to the messages in the 3pane view

functions.name: enableButton
functions.description: enables the button in a specific row, should only be called if the corresponding mail has an unsub method.

parameters.name: rowNo
parameters.description: the row for which the button should be enabled

events.name: onButtonClicked
events.description: called when a button on a message in the 3pane view is clicked

parameters.name: rowNo
parameters.description: the row number of this button and message in the table view.

events.name: onButtonProduced
events.description: fired whenever a button is added to the dom. Button is disabled and must be enabled by a call to enable button (if the mail has an unsub method)

parameters.name: rowNo
parameters.description: the number of the mail in the current list, meaning the number of the row to which this button was added.
